mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", sku.name AS "skuInfo.name", a.order_id AS "orderHeader.id", orheader.order_num AS "orderHeader.orderNum", a.send_num AS "sendNum", a.cust_id AS "customer.id", s.name AS "customer.name", a.send_time AS "sendDate", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info sku ON a.sku_id = sku.id LEFT JOIN biz_order_header orheader ON a.order_id = orderheader.id LEFT JOIN sys_office s ON a.cust_id = s.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_send_goods_record( id, sku_id, order_id, send_num, cust_id, send_time, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{skuInfo.id}, #{orderHeader.id}, #{sendNum}, #{customer.id}, #{sendDate}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_send_goods_record SET sku_id = #{skuInfo.id}, order_id = #{orderHeader.id}, send_num = #{sendNum}, cust_id = #{customer.id}, send_time = #{sendDate}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
